participant_1.background:
I like gardening.
I have a cat named felix and a small terror names emmy.
I live in a small city.
I like to cook.

participant_2.background:
I play tabletop games with friends.
I still live at home.
I have a crush on my co worker.
I love rpg computer games.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do?
I love playing tabletop games with friends!
Oh, that's fun! What kind of games do you play?
I love playing D&D, Pathfinder, and other RPGs.
I've never played D&D, but it sounds like fun! What's it like?
It's a lot of fun! You create your own character and go on adventures with your friends.
That sounds awesome! I'll have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a great way to spend time with friends and have some fun.
So, what else do you like to do?
I love cooking! I'm always trying new recipes and making new dishes.
That's awesome! I love to cook too! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making pasta dishes! I love the way they smell and the way they taste.
Pasta is my favorite food! I love making it with my family.
That's awesome! I love making pasta with my friends.
So, what's your favorite place to go in your city?
I love going to the park! It's a great place to relax and have some fun.
The park is my favorite place to go too! I love going for walks and reading books there.
That's awesome! I love going to the park with my friends and family.
Me too! It's a great place to spend time with the people you love.
